dct_title_s: Recentissima novi orbis, sive, Americæ Septentrionalis et Meridionalis tabula
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Cartouche drawn by: Ph. Tideman. Cartouche engraved by: G. v. Gouwen. Inset shows part of Van Diemans Land. A later state of the ca. 1685 issue with more detailed inset.
